Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DIGDRVSTAGE

The basic type DIGDRVSTAGE describes the stage in the driver pipeline to install the filter on.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 DP_FLUSH Sets the provider to be called when the mixing buffer is to be cleared to silence (before the DP_MERGE stage is called on each HSAMPLE).
 DP_DEFAULT_FILTER Sets the default filter provider for this HDIGDRIVER. Once set, each call to AIL_init_sample will set the sample's filter provider to this value.
 DP_DEFAULT_MERGE Sets the merge provider for this HDIGDRIVER. The merge provider is called to mix each HSAMPLE's current address into the internal MSS mixing build buffer.
 DP_COPY Sets the provider to be called when all mixing is completed and the internal MSS mixing build buffer needs to be scaled down from 32-bits into the final output buffer.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Functions: AIL_init_sample, AIL_set_digital_driver_processor
